about_the_game:
WE THANK YOU FOR YOUR SACRIFICE.
PLEASE WAIT IN PEACE FOR THE CONDUCTOR TO ARRIVE.
EVEN NOW, WE ASK THAT YOU REFRAIN FROM MAKING ANY IMPRINTS OF YOURSELF - THERE IS NO NEED TO ENDANGER YOUR LOVED ONES.

- the train crew on behalf of the Supreme Engineer

A Card Horror Adventure about Last Human Train


Collect cards
Search for hidden clues, solve riddles, and talk to the odd strangers you travel with. The train is yours to explore, the trading cards are your reward.

Knowledge is both a burden and a highest gift.

Combine the cards
Sift through your deck, look for connections, find out who is hiding something from you and plan your next steps. Then, turn your intentions into a card combination.

A puzzle in itself, waiting to be solved, is the train in whose heart we live.

Cast the cards
Use what you learned. Manipulate the environment, expose the lies, free yourself. Play your cards right and you might be redeemed.

Are we brave enough to face what lies at the end of the tunnel?

content_descriptors.notes:
The game explores such topics as mortality and consciousness. Themes of death, suicide and violence are implied through dialogue and environment.

May evoke feelings of melancholy and hopelessness.

name: Dreadline Express

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: First-person card-collecting horror game that lets you explore the insides of the last human train. Collect trading cards, talk to passengers, investigate, deduce and create card combinations to unravel the dark mysteries creeping around you.
